title: Authorizes an applicant for a pistol or revolver license to possess such while attending a pre-license firearms safety course
summary: Authorizes an applicant for a pistol or revolver license to possess such while attending a pre-license firearms safety course and while under the supervision of the instructor thereof.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to authorizing the possession of a pistol or revolver while attending a pre-license firearms safety course
